fault.message: Java is running very low on perm-gen memory.

condition.message: Running very low on perm-gen memory in Java.

cause.message: Too much perm-gen memory in use: too many class/objects may be defined. Not enough memory available in perm-gen memory.

resolution.message: 1) Ensure that the CLOUD_OPTS variable set in eucalyptus.conf includes a value for --XX:MaxPermSize. Set or increase this value as necessary: by default, it should be at least 64MB. This value can be expressed in bytes, or as '64M', '1G' etc. 2) Restart the cloud application. 3) If this condition continues despite a high value for --XX:MaxPermSize, it may be necessary to add more physical memory to the machine.
